snippet: The N.H.L. general managers rejected a measure that would have made the two-line pass illegal, but they have decided to ask the American Hockey League to experiment next season with something called a ringette line.
abstract: The N.H.L. general managers rejected a measure that would have made the two-line pass illegal, but they have decided to ask the American Hockey League to experiment next season with something called a ringette line.

headline.main: The Red Line and the Ringette Line: What's the Difference?
